description: Calculation Methodologies 2 & 3, Table 1: Well-specific input data

columnDefinitions.headerName:
[WDp]
Well depth from either the top of the well or the lowest packer to the bottom of the well, p
(feet)

[SPp]
Shut-in pressure or surface pressure for wells with tubing production and no packers or casing pressure for each well, p, or casing-to-tubing pressure ratio of one well from the same sub-basin multiplied by the tubing pressure of each well, p, in the sub-basin
(psia)

[WDp]
Tubing depth to plunger bumper for each well, p
(feet)

[SPp]
Flow-line pressure for each well, p
(psia)

[Vp]
Number of unloading events per year per well, p

[SFRp]
Average flow-line rate of gas for well, p
(scf/hr)

[HRp,q]
Time that each well, p, was left open to the atmosphere during each unloading event, q
(hours)

[NOTE: use average hours for all well unloading events.]
